import React from "react"; import useInterval from "../utils/useInterval"; import { secondsToDuration } from "../utils/duration"; function Pomodoro(props) { const { isTimerRunning, focusDuration, remainingFocusTime, setRemainingFocusTime, } = props; // Timer starts out paused useInterval( () => { // ToDo: Implement what should happen when the timer is running setRemainingFocusTime((prevState) => prevState - 1); }, isTimerRunning ? 1000 : null ); const progressPercentage = ((focusDuration - remainingFocusTime) * 100) / focusDuration; const progressPercentageRound = progressPercentage.toFixed(2); return (
{/* TODO: Update this text to display the current focus session duration */} Focus Duration: {secondsToDuration(focusDuration)}
{/* TODO: Update this text to display the current break session duration */} Break Duration: {secondsToDuration(breakDuration)}
{/* TODO: This area should show only when a focus or break session is running or pauses */}
{/* TODO: Update message below to include current session (Focusing or On Break) and total duration */}

Focusing for {secondsToDuration(focusDuration)} minutes

{/* TODO: Update message below to include time remaining in the current session */}

{secondsToDuration(remainingFocusTime)} remaining

); } export default Pomodoro;
